publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1146 Ms Sandra White: EOC "It's Time to Get Even" Campaign-That the Parliament notes the "It's Time to Get Even" campaign by the Equal Opportunities Commission (EOC) Scotland to highlight pay inequalities between men and women; further notes that the average pay gap between men and women is £482 per month, and congratulates EOC Scotland for bringing forward this high profile campaign and drawing attention to this extremely serious issue.

S2M-1146 Ms Sandra White: EOC "It's Time to Get Even" Campaign-That the Parliament notes the "It's Time to Get Even" campaign by the Equal Opportunities Commission (EOC) Scotland to highlight pay inequalities between men and women; further notes that the average pay gap between men and women is £482 per month, and congratulates EOC Scotland for bringing forward this high profile campaign and drawing attention to this extremely serious issue. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1146 EOC "It's Time to Get Even" Campaign (lodged on 1 April 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1146 EOC "It's Time to Get Even" Campaign (lodged on 1 April 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1146 EOC "It's Time to Get Even" Campaign (lodged on 1 April 2004) Donald Gorrie*
